Body:
s_stars, c_stars, m_stars, filt = setup()
filt.learn(s_stars[:80], c_stars[:80])
sx = filt.getAllPredictions(s_stars[80:], with_features=True, check_passing
    =True)
cx = filt.getAllPredictions(c_stars[80:], with_features=True, check_passing
    =True)
assert sx.columns.tolist() == cx.columns.tolist() == ['Abbe value',
    'LDADec', 'QDADec', 'passed_LDADec', 'passed_QDADec', 'passed']
assert sx['passed'].sum() > cx['passed'].sum()
